topic.title: Using the Plugin to Automate Output

body.p: plugin allows you to use a command line interface script to obtain WebHelp output from DITA and DocBook documents. Note that the plugin is a standalone product with its own licensing terms and cannot be used with a license.
The WebHelp output files created with the plugin are the same as the output files produced when you run DITA or DocBook to WebHelp transformation scenarios from within .

When an automated process is required due to the amount of output needed, do the following:
Install the plugin.
Acquire a license from .
Integrate the plugin with DITA or DocBook.
